results.title: Metformin ameliorates insulin resistance, thyroid nodules and thyroid function.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSION: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ could significantly improve @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@IR@@@ and oxidative stress levels, regulate TSH levels, and shrink @DISEASE_Thyroid_Nodule @DISEASE_MESH:D016606 @@@TNs@@@ in @<m>DISEASE_Tn_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562719 @@@TN@@@ patients with @DISEASE_Insulin_Resistance @DISEASE_MESH:D007333 @@@IR@@@, with high safety.

citations.NLM: Ji S, Gao R, Gao Q, Leng L, Gai N. Metformin ameliorates insulin resistance, thyroid nodules and thyroid function. Am J Transl Res. 2023;15(10):6180-6188. PMID: 37969194
citations.BibTeX: @article{37969194, title={Metformin ameliorates insulin resistance, thyroid nodules and thyroid function.}, author={Ji S and Gao R and Gao Q and Leng L and Gai N}, journal={Am J Transl Res}, volume={15}, number={10}, pages={6180-6188}}

results.title: Effects of Metformin on TSH Levels and Benign Nodular Goiter Volume in Patients Without Insulin Resistance or Iodine Insufficiency
results.text_hl: A protective effect of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MTF@@@ on growing @<m>DISEASE_Tn_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C562719 @@@TN@@@ was suggested (OR: 0.11; IC: 0.02-0.84) in those with higher UIC.

citations.NLM: Dos Santos PB, Gertrudes LN, Conceição FL, de Andrade BM, de Carvalho DP, Vaisman M, Teixeira PFDS. Effects of Metformin on TSH Levels and Benign Nodular Goiter Volume in Patients Without Insulin Resistance or Iodine Insufficiency Front Endocrinol (Lausanne). 2019;10():465. PMID: 31379740
